ygData.subject: Is the 3rd book in the game or not ??
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Folks, Is Gimblestones book IX (the 3rd book of tinkering) in the game or not ? I have heard some folks say that it is, and other folks say that it was
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Folks,

Is Gimblestones book IX (the 3rd book of tinkering) in the game or not ?

I have heard some folks say that it is, and other folks say that it was
taken out. There is a good chance that if it is in the game, that it
might contain the recipe for the scuba gear.

So anyone with a clue tell me, is the 3rd book really in the game and the
general public just not found it yet? Or does it not even exist.

Thanx,

FizzWizz of tunare
